Interface: WP_User

Este tipo se implementa para definir de manera apropiada la estructura de datos de los datos de usuario recibidos.

 1export interface WP_User {
 2    id:                 number;
 3    username:           string;
 4    name:               string;
 5    first_name:         string;
 6    last_name:          string;
 7    email:              string;
 8    url:                string;
 9    description:        string;
10    link:               string;
11    locale:             string;
12    nickname:           string;
13    slug:               string;
14    roles:              string[];
15    registered_date:    Date;
16    capabilities:       { [key: string]: boolean };
17    extra_capabilities: ExtraCapabilities;
18    avatar_urls:        { [key: string]: string };
19    meta:               any[];
20    is_super_admin:     boolean;
21    _links:             Links;
22}
